text: numbala ta dædi vadha vedana di himsa karamin da, numbala ge pirimi daruvan mara damamin da, numbalage gæhænu daruvan ta jivita danaya demin da siti firavun ge parapuren numbala va api mudava gat avastha va sihipat karanu. tava da evaye hi numbala ge paramadhipatigen vu atimahat piriksumak tibina
